title: 'Reeves must go' and Tom Stoppard tributes

title: They have six packs - but they're still jumping on and off weight-loss jabs
description: As weight-loss drugs grow more popular, experts warn of the risks of using them without supervision for quick, cosmetic results.
content:
Gabriela was trying to lose the weight she'd gained during the Covid pandemic. But a few stubborn kilos just wouldn't budge.
She had tried everything, she says. Going on a stricter diet; being more consistent with her high-intensity workouts six days... [7342 chars]

title: Holly Willoughby facing court hearing as former This Morning star is charged with 'driving carelessly' in her Mini Cooper
description: The television personality is set to appear at Lavender Hill Magistrates' Court next week.
content:

title: Ariana Grande's And Cynthia Erivo's 'Non-Demi Semi-Binary' Relationship is Not Real: 'It's Just Sisterhood' Fans Fire Back
description: The term was amplified by a fabricated quote and a made-up term that combines elements of demisexual, nonbinary, and queer-curious language.

title: Three Reasons To Wait For The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra
description: Samsung is expected to debut the Galaxy S26 Ultra in mid- to late-January 2026, Rather than buy a nearly year-old Galaxy S25 handset today, what benefits are there to waiting for the S26?
content: Samsung is expected to debut the Galaxy S26 Ultra and the rest of the S26 family at a Galaxy Unpacked event in mid- to late-January 2026, with retail release two weeks after. We could see 2026’s leading flagship in a few weeks. Rather than buy a near... [2973 chars]
